CPL-R.BK.summary: CPL Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather products in Thailand. It offers footwear leather products, which include full grain and suede split leather products comprising nubuck, oil and wax, pigment, sued, and water proof leather for shoe factories; and aniline and finished splits leather. The company also provides tanning services; and manufactures and distributes personal protective equipment. In addition, it exports its products to China, Vietnam, Indonesia, India, etc. CPL Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

PAF-R.BK.long_name: Pan Asia Footwear Public Company Limited
PAF-R.BK.summary: Pan Asia Footwear Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of footwear and bags in Thailand. It is also involved in the manufacture of soles and parts for footwear; manufacture and distribution of plastic parts and injection; manufacture, repair, and maintenance of molds; dyeing of fabrics; and manufacture of polypropylene cutting board and eyelets, as well as organic farming business activities. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Si Racha, Thailand.

RSP-R.BK.summary: Rich Sport Public Company Limited manufactures and sells sneakers and apparel products in Thailand and internationally. Its products include sneakers for men, women, and kids; and tees, pants, shorts, leggings, and jackets for men and women, as well as accessories, such as bags, caps, and socks. The company offers its products primarily under the All Star, Cons, and Jack Purcell names. Rich Sport Public Company Limited was founded in 1908 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
